introduction.summary: Nagad is poised to become an essential component of Bangladesh’s financial fabric, aligned with the needs of the people and the Government’s development goals. It envisions a one-stop digital banking destination through industry-wide partnerships.
introduction.mission: To provide comprehensive, digital, and ever-evolving financial services to the people and small businesses of Bangladesh.
